review: Great little addition to your home media.
author: Gabe

review: These things change the game. I can stream to my TV now from my computer whenever my Roku 3 doesn't have anything to watch.
author: Dustin Shane Smith

review: Works like it says, but isn't as easy as it sounds.  My 65 year old mother couldn't figure it out so I did it for her.  A blue-ray streaming player is much easier to stream on and will play DVD's too, but I will admit, this Chromecast is nice to take with you to hotel rooms or to the lake where space is limited.
author: J. Lee Case Wills

review: Works as it should but went with Apple TV instead. Lack of support for Apple products.
author: Scott Schroeder "Scott D. Schroeder"

review: My favorite gadget! I couldnt live without it! Works great with my phone and tablet.
author: Jennifer Rosca

review: Simple setup, great dongle. (lol I said Dongle) but anyway buy it.
